entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming south 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023
